ViewObject.Name: ExternalEmpOrgVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: select distinct hv.organization_id as emp_orgid, hv.name as emp_orgname, 0 as sortflag from hr_all_organization_units hv, (select decode(houv.attribute3, '三层', CUX_HR_BONUS.GET_ORGID_LEVEL2(DIST_EMP.DEP_ID), '四层', CUX_HR_BONUS.GET_ORGID_LEVEL2(DIST_EMP.DEP_ID), DIST_EMP.DEP_ID) as ORG_ID from (select distinct CBP.DEP_ID from CUX_BONUS_PERSON_DISTRIBUTION CBP where CBP.ATTRIBUTE4 = 'EXTERNAL' ) DIST_EMP, (SELECT A1.ORGANIZATION_ID_CHILD as ORGANIZATION_ID FROM APPS.PER_ORG_STRUCTURE_ELEMENTS_V A1 WHERE A1.ORG_STRUCTURE_VERSION_ID = CUX_PER_TC_PKG.GET_ORG_STR_VER_ID START WITH A1.ORGANIZATION_ID_PARENT = :1 --CUX_HR_BONUS.GET_COMP_ID_BYRESP AND A1.ORG_STRUCTURE_VERSION_ID = CUX_PER_TC_PKG.GET_ORG_STR_VER_ID CONNECT BY PRIOR A1.ORGANIZATION_ID_CHILD = A1.ORGANIZATION_ID_PARENT AND A1.ORG_STRUCTURE_VERSION_ID = CUX_PER_TC_PKG.GET_ORG_STR_VER_ID union all SELECT CUX_HR_BONUS.GET_COMP_ID_BYRESP FROM DUAL ) T, hr_all_organization_units houv where DIST_EMP.DEP_ID = T.ORGANIZATION_ID and DIST_EMP.DEP_ID = houv.organization_id ) M where hv.organization_id = M.ORG_ID union all select -1 as emp_orgid,'线外' as emp_orgname, 1 as sortflag from dual
